User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the FocusFinds application.

profileImageUrl.description: URL of the user's profile image.

isAdmin.description: Indicates whether the user has administrative privileges.

Media.title: Media
Media.description: Represents an image or video on the platform.

mediaUrl.description: URL of the original media file.

thumbnailUrl.description: URL of the media thumbnail (especially for videos).

uploadDate.description: Date and time when the media was uploaded.

dominantColor.description: The dominant color of an image, used for UI theming.

SiteSettings.title: SiteSettings
SiteSettings.description: A singleton document to store site-wide settings.

heroImageUrl.description: The URL for the homepage hero image background.

heroImageHint.description: The AI hint for the hero image.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a message thread started by a user.

name.description: Name of the sender at the time of creation.

firstMessage.description: The initial message that started the thread.

imageUrl.description: URL of an image sent with the first message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the thread was created.

isRead.description: Indicates if the admin has read the latest message.

lastReplyAt.description: Timestamp of the last reply in the thread.

lastMessageSnippet.description: A snippet of the last message sent in the thread.

Reply.title: Reply
Reply.description: Represents a reply within a message thread.

imageUrl.description: URL of an image sent with the reply.

sentAt.description: Timestamp when the reply was sent.

isFromAdmin.description: True if the reply is from an admin.

params.name: messageId
